stede2023framing.title: Framing climate change in Nature and Science editorials: applications of supervised and unsupervised text categorization
stede2023framing.author: Stede, Manfred and Bracke, Yannic and Borec, Luka and Kinkel, Neele Charlotte and Skeppstedt, Maria
stede2023framing.paperMotivationText: Can we automatically replicate a manual framing analysis on the topic of climate change, to reduce the manual effort?
stede2023framing.paperContributionText: Digital version of the corpus of Hume et al and replication experiments
stede2023framing.paperResultsText: The topic modeling algorithm was able to reproduce central trends in the temporal analysis of framing that was presented by Hulme et al. based on their manual work.
stede2023framing.resourcesOtherText: NatSciEdCC: Nature and Science editorials on climate change
